encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - Most of the requested changes were made. However, biblio references found in MP3, with the exception of AfP 11 and the ed. pr., were not added.
Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - verso, l. 3: change overstroke to *filler(extension)*. verso, 3.: delete the lenis after alpha and note in the commentary that there is a dot over the alpha.

General - Meta: Biblio, change number from '6' to 'VI'. Add link to online resource: https://digital.onb.ac.at/RepViewer/viewer.faces?doc=DOD_%2BZ215553308&order=1&view=SINGLE Change display name to "Fragment of Aeolic Lyric (Alcaeus? Sappho?)". Delete legacy data. Add 'lyric' to genre. Add Alcaeus to TLG Author. Add MP3 01899.000. Add geo ids. The following bibl in MP3 could be added: Bibl.: fr. 27 (Inc. Auct.) Voigt; Galiano, LG 100; Diehl, Anth. Lyr. 12.4.214; Lobel-Page, PLF 297 ("Incertum utrius auctoris fragmenta"); Treu, Sappho 16; APF 11.245; Typ. 327
Submit - Text added according to ed. pr. and (in the case of fr. 1 verso) the newest edition of Neri (2021).
Commit - Text added according to newest edition (Neri 2021)
Finalized - Most of the requested changes were made. However, biblio references found in MP3, with the exception of AfP 11 and the ed. pr., were not added.
Finalized - Most of the requested changes have been made. The exception is with the biblio information. The artice in AfP 1911 has been added but other bibliographical items found in MP3 have not.
Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - verso, l. 3: change overstroke to *filler(extension)*. verso, 3.: delete the lenis after alpha and note in the commentary that there is a dot over the alpha.
